question: Which bacterial disease has hit China affecting over 3000 people?
explanation:
China has recently reported the spread of Brucellosis, a bacterial infection. It is often caused by close contact with infected animals or animal products.
The disease causes fevers, joint pain and headaches. The Health authorities of China have said there has been no evidence of person-to-person transmission of Brucellosis so far in the country. It is said to have spread among people working in a state-owned biopharmaceutical plant in Lanzhou.
